summary: Worker crashes intermittently during load tests with a V8 promise hook assertion failure. The crash occurs in native code during promise processing and is difficult to reproduce locally.
userImpact: Workers crash unpredictably under load, causing workflow execution interruptions and requiring manual restarts.
rootCause: V8 promise hook assertion failure in native code (workflow-isolate-extension.cc:47), indicating improper handling of promise state during high-concurrency scenarios.
proposedFix: Merge PR #264 to address underlying promise handling; add detailed assertion messages per PR #268 for better diagnostics.
resolutionDetails: Issue resolved through related PR #268 which added more informative assertion error messages. Root cause addressed by architectural changes in PR #264.
keyQuote: node: ../workflow-isolate-extension.cc:47: void custom_promise_hook(v8::PromiseHookType, v8::Local<v8::Promise>, v8::Local<v8::Value>): Assertion `!result.IsEmpty()' failed.
